title: Replace About Us founder picture with provided reference photo

requirements.text: Update the About Us page founder image to use the user-provided reference photo, keeping the existing image path `/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg` so the Founder's Message section displays the new picture.

quotes:
In the about us section 
Please change the founder picture 
Add the given reference photo

acceptanceCriteria: About Us page (Founder's Message section) displays the updated founder picture.
The image continues to load from `/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg` (no broken image).
No layout regressions occur in the Founder's Message card on mobile or desktop.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components).
Do not edit any frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Changing founder name/title text or any other About Us content beyond replacing the founder picture.
Adding image upload functionality or storing images via the backend.

required: Founder portrait photo cropped to a centered 3:4 frame (founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg)
